trans-unit.target: 标识类型的异常处理子句。

trans-unit.source: To examine the exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object and call the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A> method to obtain the method body.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查的方法中的异常处理子句，获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象并调用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A>方法来获取的方法体。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A> property to obtain a list of <xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A>属性来获取的列表<xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause>对象。</xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用异常处理子句需要对元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的全面了解。

trans-unit.source: Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set".
trans-unit.target: 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"第 ii 部分︰ 元数据定义和语义"和"第三部分︰ CIL 指令集"中找不到的信息。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 联机; 我们提供了文档请参阅[ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上和[标准 ecma-335-公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) Ecma International 网站上。

trans-unit.source: The clause accepts all exceptions that derive from a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 子句接受指定类型派生的所有异常。

trans-unit.source: The clause is executed if an exception occurs, but not on completion of normal control flow.
trans-unit.target: 该子句执行是如果发生异常，但不是能在正常控制流完成。

trans-unit.source: The clause contains user-specified instructions that determine whether the exception should be ignored (that is, whether normal execution should resume), be handled by the associated handler, or be passed on to the next clause.
trans-unit.target: 子句包含用户指定的说明，以确定是否应忽略异常，（即，是否应继续正常执行），由关联的处理程序，或传递到下一步的子句。

trans-unit.source: The clause is executed whenever the try block exits, whether through normal control flow or because of an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 该子句执行是每当 try 块退出，是否通过正常控制流或由于未经处理的异常。
